thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: ReaderIzzy

author: ReaderIzzy
title: ReaderIzzy
text: Thrift Books is a very nice site to go to when looking for preowned books. I enjoy the large selection and the low prices. It's also nice that orders over $10 ship for free. My only complaint is that my order get messed up, they managed to send me the wrong book completely. I contacted Customer Service and they responded fairly quickly and sent me the correct book. Overall, I would say shop with them again, but I might make several smaller orders instead of a large order to avoid potential mess ups.
